poem:
### The Unsung Words

Above the stage, in gentle glow,  
a chorus whispers what you miss below.  
Tim Rice, the bard, nods in agreement—  
his words need light for full achievement.  
Silent verses now take flight,  
surtitles dancing in the night,  
unveiling secrets in the rhyme,  
giving every line its time.
